creditline: The Marilyn C. Benson Endowment for Art Acquisition
markings: verso selvedge, printed: SVENSKA VÅRBLOMMOR KOMP AV JOSEF [FRANK]
text: Rectangular textile length with a white ground densely scattered with repeating images of blooming plants with green stems/leaves and red, yellow, orange, blue, and purple flowers. Flower types include fritillary, marsh marigold, violet, primula, anemone, tulip, grape hyacinth, crocus, and narcissus.
title: Svenska Varblommer (Swedish spring flowers)
